title: News
content:
### Waltz 1.27

Waltz 1.27 is released, release notes are available [here](http://confluence.gslb.db.com/display/CTCTOWALTZ/Release+Management).

To learn more about the homepage changes you can watch this [screencast](https://waltz.finos.org/blog/waltz/screencast/2020/07/15/favourites.html)
